name: Ashford Hospitality Trust, Inc.
description: Ashford Hospitality Trust, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on acquiring and investing in high-quality, premium-branded, select-service and full-service hotels. Founded in 2003, the company aims to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to its investors through the acquisition of hotel properties that offer significant upside potential. Ashford Hospitality Trust operates a portfolio of hotels primarily located in the United States, affiliated with renowned brands such as Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt. The company employs a value-add strategy, improving the operational performance of its assets through capital improvements, effective management, and strategic marketing initiatives. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and community engagement, Ashford Hospitality Trust seeks to enhance the guest experience while also maximizing asset value. The company is committed to maintaining a diversified portfolio to mitigate risks associated with market fluctuations and changes in consumer preferences. Ashford Hospitality Trust's operations are supported by a dedicated team of industry professionals who leverage their extensive expertise to drive performance and growth, ultimately delivering long-term value to shareholders.
